configurationParameter.name: GZIP
configurationParameter.description: If set to true, the JSON output will be GZIPped

configurationParameter.name: FilterBoards
configurationParameter.description: Class names of filter boards. A filter board is a simple Java class holding a range of filters as variables. Thus, the class is just a facility to group filters together so they can be used by field or document generators.

configurationParameter.name: FieldGenerators
configurationParameter.description: Qualified class names of the field generators to run. A field generator is a class that adds fields to a document. The document will typically correspond to the CAS and the fields to some annotations.

configurationParameter.name: DocumentGenerators
configurationParameter.description: Class names of document generators. Document generators are one step on top of field generators: Instead of only creating a number of fields for a single document, corresponding to the CAS, an arbitrary number of documents may be emitted by each document generator. For example, individual documents for each sentence of nominal phrase of a CAS could be generated.

configurationParameter.name: IdField
configurationParameter.description: A field, generated by a field generator, whose value should be used as ElasticSearch document ID for the indexed document. Must be a single RawToken or PreanalyzedFieldValue. Does only apply for documents created by FieldGenerators. DocumentGenerators should set an ID of their own. The ID defaults to Header#docId().

configurationParameter.name: IdPrefix
configurationParameter.description: A prefix to set to the document ID of the indexed ElasticSearch document.
